thread.title: EU says US data transfers 'can continue' despite Facebook ruling
thread.title_full: EU says US data transfers 'can continue' despite Facebook ruling

title: EU says US data transfers 'can continue' despite Facebook ruling
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Tue, Oct 6, 2015, 15:43 BST - UK Markets close in 47 mins. EU says US data transfers 'can continue' despite Facebook ruling AFP – 30 minutes ago View Photo 

The EU insisted Tuesday that Internet companies like Facebook (NasdaqGS: FB - news ) can keep transferring personal information to the United States while authorities work out a replacement for a transatlantic deal struck down by the bloc's top court. 
"In the meantime, transatlantic data flows between companies can continue using other mechanisms for international transfers of personal data available under EU data protection law," European Commission Vice President Frans Timmermans said.
